name: io.github.tencent-lexiang/mcp-server
title: Tencent Lexiang MCP Server
description: Tencent Lexiang is an AI-powered enterprise knowledge base. This MCP server enables AI assistants to search knowledge bases, manage entries, edit documents, and handle file uploads/downloads. Features include multi-source knowledge aggregation (WeChat files, WeChat Official Account articles, Tencent Meeting, Tencent Docs), intelligent Q&A with AI chat, and enterprise-grade security.
